title: Nocturne interface bug
body: On nocturne you know his passive has CD reduced when autoing, and it gives the flash on the ability icon to show that the cd was reduced, but whenever this happens it also flashes on his q, even though his q does not reduce in cooldown it can be confusing.{{champion:56}}

replies.body: yes ive noticed this issue as well, though in my case after fireing the q it tried to apply the passive on his shield, aa's make the shield look like its being reduced while my q is on cd
